nodes.text: Rasker Hill was a location on Naboo. It rested near the south ridge of the planet's capital city of Theed. Several ancient ruins were located on top of the hill. A farm and a small village were interspersed nearby.

During the Invasion of Naboo in the year 32 BBY, when Captain Quarsh Panaka returned to the planet to liberate it from the Trade Federation Droid Army, he met with Lieutenant Gavyn Sykes at Rasker Hill. Their meeting was interrupted by elements of the Droid Army, but Sykes destroyed the interloping Single Trooper Aerial Platforms and the droid starfighter.

Rasker Hill appears in the 2000 video game Star Wars: Episode I: Battle for Naboo. The player, assuming the role of Sykes, must defend Captain Panaka and destroy all the droid forces before triggering a cutsene and proceeding.
